import React, {useEffect} from 'react' import like from '../assets/img/like-icon.png' import chicken from '../assets/img/item-chicken.png' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { addCart, fetchFromLocalStorage } from '../reducks/carts/operations' import { getCarts } from '../reducks/carts/selectors' export default function Item({item}) { const dispatch=useDispatch() const [selected_count,setSelected_count] = 0 carts= useSelector(getCarts) useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(fetchFromLocalStorage()) if(carts){ selected } }) return ( <>

(0)

{item.name}

Write Review Check Review

${item.price}

) }
